dict.string: An Launch Agent XML property list file.

An XML property list file for Launch Agent to run daemons on OSX similiar to cron. For a complete list of avalable plist tags, checkout http://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#documentation/Darwin/Reference/ManPages/man5/launchd.plist.5.html#//apple_ref/doc/man/5/launchd.plist To get things started, checkout the Apple documenation on creating and launching custom daemons: http://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#documentation/MacOSX/Conceptual/BPSystemStartup/Chapters/CreatingLaunchdJobs.html
